option.superaxes.harvest_leaves.tooltip: Default is §cNo§r. §aYes §rwill harvest the tree leaves.
option.superaxes.range.tooltip: Default is 5. A greater range will scan a greater radius of leaves to harvest.
option.superaxes.limit_log_search.toolti: Default is §cNo§r. Use §aYes §rif it takes too long to harvest trees on modded biomes.
option.superaxes.log_radius.tooltip: Default is 8. A greater range will scan a greater radius of logs to harvest.
option.superaxes.shape_scale.tooltip_2: A greater number will scan for logs separated by leaves at the expense of time
option.superaxes.shape_scale.tooltip_3: §eWarning:§r Not recommended to change. Can cause lag or unresponsiveness.
option.superaxes.debug_lines.tooltip_2: Use §aYes §rto enable the use of SHIFT+RIGHT_CLICK to see log blocks
option.superaxes.debug_lines.tooltip_3: that would be harvested if the SuperAxe is used on the log block
